name: School of Fish (Turtle Games Studio, Incjoaco, ilbini, IncTeddy, rubinoffsama, gandeladri)
name_original: School of Fish (Turtle Games Studio, Incjoaco, ilbini, IncTeddy, rubinoffsama, gandeladri)
description:
School of Fish is a fun-addicting 3D casual game. This amusing and relaxing underwater game will test your speed and timing skills.

- Recruit friendly fishes to grow your shoal.

- Scare enemy fishes if your shoal is big enough

The game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. The theme was "Stronger Together"

Bini - Developer

RubinoffSama - Models & Animations

Joako - Artist

Teddy - Game Designer, Sound

Z0 - Developer
